page.title: 15Industry
page.content:
Watts Blake & Bearnes clay company was founded in 1860 although clay has been mined in the area from Roman times. The clay seam is found in a line through the Bovey basin which is about 10 miles long & 3 miles wide.
Opencast Quarrying {____________________ The opencast quarry workings are sited on the outcrops of the clay surroundings of the Bovey Tracey basin.Extraction is done in two ways either by hand or mechanical digging. Open cast working is preferable to underground methods due to economic considerations.The exposed clay is won mechanically by means of hydraulic excavators, loaded into dumpers and transported to the storage bays.
